New Records: The Yankees scored 11 runs, the most in a World Series game since 1970
Key Match Events: Anthony Volpe hit a grand slam in the third inning
New York's eighth inning comeback with multiple runs, including a three-run home run by Torres
The Yankees became the first team since 1970 to extend the World Series to a fifth game
Pre-Game Insights: The Dodgers used a bullpen game to keep their main relievers fresh for Game 5
Post-Match Reflections: The Yankees' win brought pride to the Bronx and ended the Dodgers' no-hitter streak
The Dodgers' bullpen performed well, keeping their main relievers fresh
Miscellaneous Highlights: A fan was ejected for prying a ball out of Mookie Betts' glove
Austin Wells had a standout game with key hits
